page.title: 14 SPORT
page.content: Many people here like sport. We share a{football}pitch with the cows. James and Ben Slack, Dominic and Ben Horton go to{cricket}lessons on Friday evenings at{Darley Dale.}With cubs we play{rounders, football, cricket and {crab football,}it is good fun. Our primary school has a{football}team. The girls play {skittleball}but there are too few for a team at school. There are sports facilities at {Ashbourne, Belper Matlock, Derby, {Callow Park}and a learner pool at {Wirksworth.}Many people enjoy jogging. Nine families go to{Ashbourne,}mainly to the{swimming}baths. Four families go to{Callow Park.}Two families go to {Derby.}One goes to{Matlock}and three to{Wirksworth swimming}baths. Most people would like to have sports facilities in Kirk Ireton. A children's playground is planned.
